```
$ kubectl run echoserver --image=k8s.gcr.io/echoserver:1.10 --restart=Never \
  --port=8080
pod/echoserver created
```

```
$ kubectl create service clusterip echoserver --tcp=80:8080
service/echoserver created
```

```
$ kubectl run echoserver --image=k8s.gcr.io/echoserver:1.10 --restart=Never \
  --port=8080 --expose
service/echoserver created
pod/echoserver created
```

```
$ kubectl create deployment echoserver --image=k8s.gcr.io/echoserver:1.10 \
  --replicas=5
deployment.apps/echoserver created
$ kubectl expose deployment echoserver --port=80 --target-port=8080
service/echoserver exposed
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: echoserver
spec:
  selector:
    run: echoserver    ![1](Images/1.png)
  ports:               ![2](Images/2.png)
  - port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
```

```
$ kubectl get services

echoserver   ClusterIP   10.109.241.68   <none>        80/TCP    6s
```

```
$ kubectl run echoserver --image=k8s.gcr.io/echoserver:1.10 --restart=Never \
  --port=8080 -l app=echoserver
pod/echoserver created
$ kubectl create service clusterip echoserver --tcp=5005:8080
service/echoserver created
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: echoserver
spec:
  type: ClusterIP          ![1](Images/1.png)
  clusterIP: 10.96.254.0   ![2](Images/2.png)
  selector:
    app: echoserver
  ports:
  - port: 5005
    targetPort: 8080
    protocol: TCP
```

```
$ kubectl get service echoserver
NAME         TYPE        CLUSTER-IP    EXTERNAL-IP   PORT(S)    AGE
echoserver   ClusterIP   10.96.254.0   <none>        5005/TCP   8s
```

```
$ kubectl run echoserver --image=k8s.gcr.io/echoserver:1.10 --restart=Never \
  --port=8080 -l app=echoserver
pod/echoserver created
$ kubectl create service nodeport echoserver --tcp=5005:8080
service/echoserver created
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: echoserver
spec:
  type: NodePort           ![1](Images/1.png)
  clusterIP: 10.96.254.0
  selector:
    app: echoserver
  ports:
  - port: 5005
    nodePort: 30158        ![2](Images/2.png)
    targetPort: 8080
    protocol: TCP
```

```

 $ kubectl create service loadbalancer echoserver --tcp=5005:8080
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: echoserver
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer            ![1](Images/1.png)
  clusterIP: 10.96.254.0
  loadBalancer: 10.109.76.157   ![2](Images/2.png)
  selector:
    app: echoserver
  ports:
  - port: 5005
    targetPort: 8080
    nodePort: 30158
    protocol: TCP
```
